name: Virus (itch) (Lazy Solutions Game Studio, Charmatataa, NaroXo, Zumwani, DestAnnie)
name_original: Virus (itch) (Lazy Solutions Game Studio, Charmatataa, NaroXo, Zumwani, DestAnnie)
description:
A game about destroying your enemies, beat the boss.

You are fighting viruses in a action shooter platformer.

This game is a entry for the community game jam with the Theme: The game is a liar.

*** SPOLIER ***

You are the virus destroying files. that's how the game lies.

*** MAJOR SPOILER ***

Start the game again to restore files, the game is not deleting or moving anything, it just sets the files to "hidden", you can also recover all by going to C:\Users\Username\Desktop and select view all hidden objects and then select all files and unhide them! The crash is intended!
